text.div:
VhDir Digital Certificate Use Value Set

Codes for documenting VHDir Digital Certificate Use

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate
    CodeDisplay
    digsigdigitalSignatureA digital certificate use of a digital signature demonstrates the intent of the signer to validate the content of the message.
    keyEnciphermentkeyEnciphermentA digital certificate use of a keyEncipherment demonstrates the intent to utilize the subject public key to establish an encrypted connection between a browser or user's computer and a server.
    authenticationauthenticationCertificate-based authentication refers to the use of a Digital Certificate to identify a user, machine, or device before granting access to a resource.

name: VhDir Digital Certificate Use Value Set
description: Codes for documenting VHDir Digital Certificate Use
